name: BOD-1
description:
Exploration and Survival: Players will explore their home, which has become a trap between worlds, and search for ways to escape this nightmare.
Puzzles and Riddles: Unravel the secrets of the otherworldly realm by solving various puzzles and riddles that stand in the way of salvation.
Atmosphere of Horror: A deep atmosphere of horror is created through ominous music, sounds, and visual effects that emphasize tension and horror with every step.

Unexpected Plot Twists: Immerse yourself in an exciting plot with unexpected twists, revealing the secrets of the protagonist's past and the nature of the otherworldly force.

The gameplay includes tense survival moments as players must navigate through dark corridors, avoiding traps, and evading attacks from otherworldly forces. Discover new areas of your home, explore surrounding objects, collect clues, and solve puzzles to uncover the secrets of this otherworldly realm.
